1.content: so, the big question. are you a boy or a girl
1.title: what are you

11.content:
are you a boy in the age category from 8 to 12, from 12 to 16 or 16 and older.

This is the last one line chapter in this story, so please keep it that way.
11.title: boy

info.brief_description: you are a new seeker, what will you do.
info.description:
You just discoverd that you`re a seeker, what will you do now.

keep the next rules in mind if you want to add:

no sex
you can choose if this story will take place during or after the series
cursing is allowd, but please keep it simple.
other than that, have fun.
please don`t add one line chapters.

have fun and don`t be affraid to add, I won`t bite.

huntik belongs to Rainbow S.p.a
